value.errorMessage: Server: 'WIN-BVO0984D4J6' The WinRM client cannot process the request because the server name cannot be resolved.
value.summaryMessage: Unable to connect to host(s) or cluster as name cannot be resolved. WinRM error code: 0x803381B9.
value.remediationGuidance: Update the hosts file on the appliance. Learn more (https://aka.ms/migrate/hyperv/nameresolution).
